pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing and Visualizing Multidimensional Plant Traits // Implements analytical methods for multidimensional plant traits, including Competitors-Stress tolerators-Ruderals strategy analysis using leaf traits, Leaf-Height-Seed strategy analysis, Niche Periodicity Table analysis, and Trait Network analysis. Provides functions for data analysis, visualization, and network metrics calculation. Methods are based on Grime (1974) doi:10.1038/250026a0, Pierce et al. (2017) doi:10.1111/1365-2435.12882, Westoby (1998) doi:10.1023/A:1004327224729, Yang et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/j.foreco.2022.120540, Winemiller et al. (2015) doi:10.1111/ele.12462, He et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.tree.2020.06.003.
